article: philippine president gloria macapagal arroyo pledged on wednesday to pursue a `` final solution '' against the abu sayyaf kidnap gang , a day after her government signed a cease-fire with a larger muslim separatist rebel group .
abstract: after peace deal with rebel group philippine leader invokes
